title: IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: The Indian Institute of Technology of Ropar (IIT Ropar) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Ropar Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before...
